CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 17, 1945, pg. 22, reads: "1945 FASHION FORECAST - What's new for 1945 will be displayed in Fashion Review, Tuesday evening, March 20, in Schenley High School. The show is being sponsored by the Beauty Shop Owners, and is expected to be the largest one ever held in Pittsburgh.  Left to right, seated: Lillian Allen, Pocahontas Crews and Lorraine Rodgers. Standing, left to right: Ethel Mallory, Marjorie Washington, Gertrude Woods, Helen Delaney and Hazel Betters. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of beauty shops owners, seated from left: Lillian Allen, Pocahontas Crews, Lorraine Rodgers; standing: Ethel Mallory holding fur stole, Marjorie Washington, Gertrude Woods, Helen Delaney, and Hazel Betters, posed in Centre Avenue YMCA, with Henry O. Tanner painting "Christ and His Mother" in background
